pages.text: The $(eclipse)Lunar Realm$() is a dimension of eternal night, where celestial materials are abundant.$(br2)To build a portal:$(br)$(li)Create a 4x5 frame using $(item)Moonstone Bricks$()$(li)Use $(item)Lunar Compass$() on the frame$(li)Step through to enter$(br2)The portal works like a Nether portal.

pages.title: Biomes
pages.text: The Lunar Realm has 4 biomes:$(br2)$(li)$(lunar)Lunar Forest$() - Trees and Moon Rabbits$(li)$(lunar)Lunar Lake$() - Star Spirits$(li)$(stellar)Starfall Hills$() - Star Fragments$(li)$(eclipse)Eclipse Wastes$() - Dangerous, boss arena
